title: The Chain Reaction [Nuclear Run] (1980 - Australia) action scifi
description:
The Chain Reaction (1980 - Australia)                       aka Nuclear Run

Action / Drama / Science Fiction
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0080513/


7 Award NOMINATIONS

filmed at Glen Davis and at Sydney, New South Wales, Australia

The movie features many actors who were in Mad Max, among them Mel Gibson as a bearded mechanic, though he doesn't appear in the title credits. The taglines used in advertising the film included "A fast drive to Paradise turns into a nuclear nightmare!" and "Mad Max meets The China Syndrome".

At the WALDO nuclear facility, Dr Heinrich Schmidt goes to deal with an emergency, only to receive a fatal dose of radiation exposure from a flooded containment breach. He is placed under medical quarantine but makes an escape. Mechanic Larry Stillson and his wife Carmel go off to spend a weekend together at a small Australian Outback town. Their idyll is then interrupted by the arrival of the amnesiac Heinrich. At the same time, sinister mercenaries employed by WALDO arrive in the area to stop Heinrich before he lets it known to the public that irradiated material from the plant has leaked into the local water table.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 686x574, 25.000 fps, 1985 Kbps, 01h28m25s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 448 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
